PROPERTY_DATA.VALUE: EUR19572v102 (declaration for Dry Component, w/o Soy Sauce
Noodles in a Chicken and Mushroom flavour sauce with vegetables and a little sachet of soy sauce.
None of that artificial colours or preservatives stuff
BEST BEFORE END: SEE DATE ON LID/SIDE
RDL-020533[2]: SN Noodle Chicken Mush 01 CR13 da3
RDL-020533[2]: SN Noodle Chicken Mush 01 CR13 da3

TEXT_DATA.TEXT: Noodles in a Chicken and Mushroom flavour sauce with vegetables and a little sachet of soy sauce.

POT, POT NOODLE and UNILEVER are registered trademarks.
Make sure you eat it while it's hot. Do not reheat.
YOU CAN MAKE IT Fill Level

Company vegetarian logo
Green dot
Unilever U device
Alufoil

Typical values as prepared............per 100g............per pot**....................%* per pot** Energy Fat of which saturates Carbohydrate of which sugars Fibre Protein Salt
*% of Reference intake of an average adult (8400kJ/2000kcal) **Pot makes up to 385g after preparation with water = 1 portion
FRONT OF PACK:
Each pot contains Energy.............Fat.........Saturates.........Sugars..........Salt kJ kcal.................g...............g..................g................g %*.................%*............%*...............%*.............%*
Per 100g: xxxkJ/xxxkcal
Please take figures for nutrition table from "on pack nutrition information as prepared" section.

Ingredients (after preparation):
Noodles: Noodles (51%) [WHEAT flour, palm fat, salt, firming agents (potassium carbonate, sodium carbonate)].
Sauce and Vegetables: Water, maltodextrin, WHEAT flour, vegetables (2.7%) [mushrooms (1.5%), sweetcorn, onion powder], potassium chloride, flavour enhancers (monosodium glutamate, disodium inosinate, disodium guanylate), flavourings (contain WHEAT, MILK), sugar, skimmed MILK powder, salt, palm fat, yeast powder (contains WHEAT, BARLEY), herbs, acid (citric acid), mushroom juice concentrate.
Sachet: Soy sauce (1%) [water, soy sauce (SOYBEANS, WHEAT), salt, molasses, sugar, acid (acetic acid)].
May contain egg, celery and mustard.
1. RIP OFF LID. Whip out the sachet. Add boiling water to fill level. Leave alone for 2 mins. 2. STIR. Leave for another 2 mins. 3. STIR AGAIN. Find sachet, add contents. 4. GRAB FORK and dig in.
Store in a cool, dry place (hint: try the cupboard)

www.potnoodle.com
Quality: If it's in perfect condition, happy days. If not, have a moan at the customer care department. And don't forget to quote the code on the pot so we know who to send back to noodle school.
Unilever UK, Freepost ADM3940, London SW1A 1YR. Unilever Ireland, Citywest, Dublin 24.
